about_the_game:
Welcome to the Archipelago!


Meet thousands of captains who trade, loot, explore, and fight for dominance over islands and valuable resources in an open world. Сhoose who you will become in this story. Will you be a nameless captain whose shipwreck rots on the shore? Or a legend whose name commands respect among allies and fear among enemies?

The Captain's Journey Begins Here


Start your journey on a modest schooner and level up as far as the legends go: a 100-gun first-rate ship.
The game features over 50 sailing ships from the 16th to 19th centuries: schooners, galleons, brigantines, frigates, and ships of the line. Each can be upgraded and customized: you can repaint the hull, decorate the masts with flags, and change the design and fabric of the sails.

Open World


Explore the open world and sail beyond the map into the Boundless Sea. Who knows what secrets await you there?
With enough gold, you can even afford a private island. It's a nice place to repair your fleet and store resources brought by your servants from mines and manufacturers.

Game Economy


Money is the lifeblood of war. How to earn them? This decision is yours to make.
●  Love to pick fights? Board merchant ships and exchange their holds for gold in the ports.  
●  Feeling like a trader? Set up a production chain. Process raw resources into goods and sell them to other players on the exchange.  
●  Want to see the world? Join reselling and transportation. Tobacco and winemaking are abundant on the southern islands. The freezing North has none of these, but it has iron to sell to make cannons in southern ports.  
●  Looking for ways to relax? Load fishing gear into your hold and head out in search of fish shoals. Fish is food for your crew and a great way to earn money.  

Team Play


A lone sea wolf is a dead sea wolf. Invite your friends to the game and form a squadron to defend against pirate attacks. Or, if you prefer to strike fear—become pirates yourselves.
Looking for epic battles with seasoned players? Join a guild! This is where the real game begins: port battles, team tactics, strategy, intrigues, and diplomacy – we’ve got you covered.
Join the endless quest for power in the Archipelago and claim your place in the World of Sea Battle!

name: World of Sea Battle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64 bit Windows 8 and above
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4570 3.2 GHz or AMD Phenom(tm) II X4 B60 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 1GB or AMD Radeon HD 6850 1GB (must support shader 5 model)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64 bit Windows 10 and above
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 3.4 GHz or AMD FX-9370 4.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 2GB or AMD Radeon HD 7850 2GB (must support shader 5 model)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Sail, fight, upgrade, and trade alongside other players in an open-world MMO set in the Age of Sails. The game features dozens of historical sailing ships, pirates, PvP and PvE, player driven economy and guild wars for territory. Hoist the Jolly Roger and plunder yer way to glory on the high seas!
supported_languages:
English*, German, Russian*
*languages with full audio support
